parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets radio trigger menu title text (0 -> 0 -> map radio). Use "NULL" to disable radio slot. Use "" to restore default title

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> index '''setRadioMsg''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - from 1 to 10

* 1 - Alpha (key 1)
* 2 - Bravo (key 2)
* 3 - Charlie (key 3)
* 4 - Delta (key 4)
* 5 - Echo (key 5)
* 6 - Foxtrot (key 6)
* 7 - Golf (key 7)
* 8 - Hotel (key 8)
* 9 - India (key 9)
* 10 - Juliet (key 0)

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>1 [[setRadioMsg]] "Click meeeeeeeeee"; //changes title of radio Alpha</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createTrigger]], [[setTriggerActivation]], [[setTriggerText]], [[showCommandingMenu]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
